page.title: 13MRS.SILTON'S NATURE RESERVE
page.content: Mrs. Silton's{Nature Reserve}is above L'Eree Bay. In the Nature Reserve there is a{Kingfisher}that hovers over our pond, and it tries to catch the {trout,}but the fish are too fast for it. We have seen birds in the pond looking for the fish, but the biggest bird was a{Heron,} which is grey in colour and has a long beak. He is a very powerful bird. There is a special place where we can go and watch the birds. Some of the types we have seen are Sparrows,Crows,lots of varieties of Tits, Pigeons, Starlings and most of all the Thrush.There are also many bats but I have only seen two or three.In the early spring there are many daffodils and sometimes we go and pick some flowers for Mrs. Silton. BY{ANDREA MARYGOLD.
